titles.title: Congratulating and saluting the Hawk Mountain Sanctuary for celebrating its 75th anniversary, commending the Hawk Mountain Sanctuary for its contributions to the preservation of wildlife and the native ecology of the Appalachian Mountains and eastern Pennsylvania, and commending the Hawk Mountain Sanctuary for its dedication to educating the public and the international community about wildlife conservation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Insular Affairs, Oceans and Wildlife.
Ms. Bordallo moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 670.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary: 9/22/2009--Passed House without amendment. Congratulates the Hawk Mountain Sanctuary for celebrating its 75th anniversary.Commends the Sanctuary for its: (1) contributions to the preservation of wildlife and the native ecology of the Appalachian Mountains and eastern Pennsylvania; and (2) dedication to educating the public and the international community about wildlife conservation.
